LanguageData.WNA_BasicCrate.label: ivory crate
LanguageData.WNA_BasicCrate.description: A small white box, specially designed for storaging items. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_Conduit.label: invisible conduit
LanguageData.WNA_Conduit.description: Wires can transport electricity, pipies can transport liquids, and this invisible conduit can transport more things. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_LinkSeat.label: ivory seat
LanguageData.WNA_LinkSeat.description: Floating translucent stool, sometimes described as "ivory-like in color". WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_LinkShelf.label: ivory shelf
LanguageData.WNA_LinkShelf.description: Floating translucent shelf, one can equal to 60 normal shelf. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_LinkTable.label: ivory table
LanguageData.WNA_LinkTable.description: Floating translucent table, sometimes described as "ivory-like in color". WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_SlotSleepSpot.label: slot sleeping spot
LanguageData.WNA_SlotSleepSpot.description: a sleeping spot occupying 1 tile only. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_TorchLamp.label: shimmer torch
LanguageData.WNA_TorchLamp.description: A WNA style torch. It doesn't flame, though. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_TorchLampB.label: discord torch
LanguageData.WNA_TorchLampB.description: A WNA style torch. it will drive nearby temperature to extreme. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_WallSafe.label: wall safe
LanguageData.WNA_WallSafe.description: A wall-mounted storage unit. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
